# Kubernetes

- Kubernetes History:
    - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BE77h7dmoQU
    - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=318elIq37PE




# add helm repository appscode
helm repo add appscode https://charts.appscode.com/stable
helm repo update
helm search repo appscode/license-proxyserver
# install chart appscode/license-proxyserver
helm upgrade --install license-proxyserver appscode/license-proxyserver \
  --namespace kubeops --create-namespace \
  --set encodedLicenses. \
  --set encodedLicenses. \
  --set encodedLicenses. \
  --set encodedLicenses. \
  --set encodedLicenses.
